body_html:
If it is not too complicated, we would like you to provide a more detailed description, and how you solved it. I think it would help other users with the same configurations.

As for this issue, I will close it for now as I have a fix for this (db59659) and it has been verified both internally and on the head of OSS version. @HggsHntr if you believe the fix didn't solve the issue, please let us know so that we can reopen and investigate more.

@SrivastavaKshitij Please do put more details if you like even when the issue is closed. Much appreciated!
